instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 2015 A1502 battery, where to buy??
threads.message:
having lot of a1502 liquid spilled machines every month, 2015 models.
as we all know,without a good battery, the board won't power on for this 2015 model. questions is where do you guys this 2015 a1502 models battery??

ebay is selling around 80, quite expensive,not the biggest issue,thing is that, they always give you bad shit, always are service batteries ,can't be charged, all that kind of stuffs.customers waited for a week for that and in the end have to order again and hope another work.

any good place to order? or sellers?
thank you

threads.title: 2015 A1502 battery, where to buy??
threads.message:
Mine come from Ebay, there is just no source of "perfect" batteries. It is all pulled junk from China and you have to live with that.

Also these boards power up fine without battery, may have shut down issues but it should power up.

threads.title: 2015 A1502 battery, where to buy??
threads.message: Hey duke,are you sure?  board number 820-4924, they really don't power up when it disconnect the batteries, every machine I saw here. must connect then it will power up.it's 2015 model

threads.title: 2015 A1502 battery, where to buy??
threads.message: Power up just fine here.....using 60/85W charger?

threads.title: 2015 A1502 battery, where to buy??
threads.message:
yes tried both already , maybe different bios?

it's the same for 2015 air as well
